#summary One-Time Initialization of HC06
#labels v5.5,Bluetooth,HC06

= Initialization of new imported parts =

When the HC06 arrives, it is set to default baud of 9600, and bluetooth name of livnor. 

We change the baud to 230400 to match the propforth default.

We change the name to something more related to LittleRobot or to the session host.
